title: ðŸš¨Jaguars release Leonard Fournette - Emergency Podcast (Football 8/31)
description:
Just 2 weeks before the start of the season, the Jaguars have released Leonard Fournette. Will Brinson is joined by Jacksonville expert Pete Prisco to break down the move and the state of the franchise. Why is the team moving on from the former 4th overall pick and why now? The guys also discuss possible landing spots for the LSU product as well as expectations for the Jags this season. Brinson and Prisco touch on the weekend move that sent Yannick Ngakoue from Jacksonville to Minnesota via trade. The once promising defense is now gutted as we break down how they got to this point.Â
